item.title: How do I make an NPC Talk?
item.dc:creator: @_A-M #A-M
item.description:
@_A-M wrote:

Go to NPCHANDLER.java

Search For : “Moo”

Under That U Should See Something That Looks Like This :

}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 2862) {
if (misc.random2(25) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = (“HAHAHA! Had a little problem did we?”);
}

Under The Last } Hit Enter And Make This :

}
if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) {
if (misc.random2(25) == 1) { // Timer He Tells It Every Second If Number 1
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = (“line of what u want it to say”);
}
/ Simply Just Make The NPC ID To The Id U Want For The NPC And The Timer ( U Choose Too) And The Line… Yeah U Could Find That Out
